DataSourcePortable.Name: Funil Status Quantidade
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 CASE TEMPERATURA
 WHEN 1 THEN 'Neutro'
 WHEN 2 THEN 'Firme'
 WHEN 3 THEN 'Risco'
 END TEMPERATURA,
 COUNT(TEMPERATURA) QTDETEMP,
 CASE TEMPERATURA
 WHEN 1 THEN '#5C9BD1'
 WHEN 2 THEN '#26C281'
 WHEN 3 THEN '#D91E18'
 END AS COR
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE TEMPERATURA IS NOT NULL
AND RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO
AND MONTH(DATAFECHAMENTO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
GROUP BY TEMPERATURA
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="TEMPERATURA" From="A" Path="TEMPERATURA" /> <Field Alias="QTDETEMP" From="A" Path="QTDETEMP" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
